website_summaries.verdict: Features and suction power that others in the handheld class can't beat. If you need a handheld vacuum, this is the one to choose.
pros: Updated version of a top-selling handheld model
Feature set includes an ergonomic handle, powerful V7 motor, and cordless operation
cons: It's costly for a handheld vacuum, but you are paying for top quality

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this item! Not only is it way over priced but it broke after two months and a few uses. I reached out to the manufactured and they said there was nothing they could do because the seller does not purchase through them directly. I reached out to Amazon who said to contact the manufacturer. Said there was nothing they could do because it was outside the short return window. Even though it says 2 year warranty its a lie. Save yourself a lot of money and headache and don't purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Gaudet

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this produce
customer_reviews.text: This is the second handheld Dyson I have owned the first stopped working about 6 months after I got it. This one is now also not working it will not hold a charge just like the first one did. I am very disappointed in this product. I loved it when I got the first one it was much more powerful than the one I have now. I will not buy another Dyson! This is a lot of money to pay for an handheld vacuum and then to have it work only 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: AKANANI7777

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Cleaning Pet Hair from Carpet
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought this years ago. It cleans far better than any kind of "dustbuster" and it is great with pet hair. I used this on the carpet in the back seat of my car and the mats look like new. It recharges quickly and stores easily. A typical great product from Tyson.
customer_reviews.author: Chin Music

customer_reviews.title: Buy a cheap one instead.
customer_reviews.text: R.I.P. It died after 3 months and 14 days (a total of 3 battery charges).
customer_reviews.author: Raminak

customer_reviews.title: Extension wand/Soft roller head
customer_reviews.text: This handheld machine perfectly works with an extension wand for v7/v8. Soft roller cleaner head for v7/v8 also works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED IN THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I have had this Dyson for about a month. It works well for quick clean ups and on the stairs. The fact that it is cordless makes it much easier to use on the stairs. However, this product was advertised as having 30 minutes of battery life after a complete charging. NOT TRUE!!!!!!!!! I bought this particular product because of that claim of the 30-minute time frame to use. I am very disappointed because it only lasts 10 to 15 minutes at a time!! I would not buy this product again nor would I recommend it. I gave it 3 stars ONLY because it does have good suction for a cordless machine.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Bower

customer_reviews.title: Shamefully Garbage Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I believed these were the best. It quit working after a month where I couldn't return it for a refund. I bought a Black and Decker one for $25 on Amazon and it works as well. I am super angry about this. Buy the Black and Decker.
customer_reviews.author: MrCritic4real

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: This product was a huge disappointment. The battery died after a few months and it’s been impossible to get it replaced. Dyson should be ashamed of themselves. If you spend this kind of money on a product it should work for longer than 3 months, and it shouldn’t take longer than that to have it fixed. Save your money and buy a black and decker.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Domenech

customer_reviews.title: Horrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: The battery doesn't last 20 minutes. Don't think you'll be able to do your car with this thing. It just doesn't last. Works great, but doesn't have enough battery life to make it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: John Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Very low battery life, limited usage time
customer_reviews.text: I am a Dyson person, loved all their products before buying this handheld cleaner. This cleaner has decent suction but the battery life is minimal, only 15’ in my hands. Then they recommend that you allow it to cool to recharge, plus 3.5 hours to charge the battery back. That is incredibly limiting to usage. Not what I expected for a Dyson product at all, highly expensive and disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Milena Furtado

customer_reviews.title: Wheres the Bug Machine Pa Pa.
customer_reviews.text: The glaring feature is one that a person would never think about when ordering. You must keep your finger on the start button and you usually see what is called a (Dead man's Switch) in the industrial world, but on a minivac? That's a bit much. The battery is part of the machine so if your going to use it to clean your car or van there's no slipping another battery in it. These two features make it useful for the grandkids running around house sucking up errant bugs and out in the yard it's a real winner with spiders and such.
customer_reviews.author: JustBill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hand held vac, Best version as of this date.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Parker Balliger

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst products I have purchased. It has terrible battery life - less that 15 mins on high suction. If you add the brush accessory it drops down even further. Would give it a zero star if I could. Save you money and get a decent product. I tried calling Dyson but the refuse to do anything. Will ask Amazon if they can help in returning this product
customer_reviews.author: Azmat  Ali

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelmed (especially for the price).
customer_reviews.text: I really, really wanted to love this vacuum. The suction is actually very good when on the max setting (unfortunately that setting also really drains the battery fast). It's also somewhat 'awkwardly heavy'. I will say that although not my intended purpose, when using the attachment for my carpeted stairs it works extremely well (although the battery does not last for the entire staircase of course). It is also easy to clean. For my primary intended use (my camper) I will go back to my Black and Decker that was only 1/3 of the price.
customer_reviews.author: GQ Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a Dyson
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of Dyson products which I find overly expensive, of shoddy quality, prone to breakdown and other than a "cool" look not somehthing I'd run out to buy again. However, this hand held with its 2 speed suction is an exception as it works well, is easy to recharge, though not especially fast, but still has the "cool" look as far as a hand held suction vacuum cleaner can have. On max suction I believe you get about 5 minutes so its good for smallish jobs, not for vacuuming out the garage! So good but manage your usage expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: The V7 is the best one yet
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth Dyson hand held vacuum. It is powerful, light weight and lasts a long time before needing recharged. I still have two Dyson DC34's in use (one in basement & one in garage). The V7 is the best one yet! I am a great fan of Dyson vacuums. I have two uprights that are still in use. The newer light weight DC50 animal and my first Dyson bought 17 years ago (which is heavy, but still works fine).
customer_reviews.author: L Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Handheld Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the Dyson V7 Trigger Cord-free Handheld vacuum cleaner! The most powerful suction I have seen in a handheld vacuum! the motorized brush is excellent at vacuuming the carpet on my stairs and the battery lasts for the entire flight! compared to other handheld vacuums, battery life isn't great but considering the power this vacuum has I'm not surprised. I highly recommend this vacuum to anyone looking for a powerful vacuum for cleaning stairs, furniture, and pet hair. I have a Maine Coon cat who sheds a lot - especially now that summer is here and this vacuum is perfect at removing all the fur from any surface!
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Horrible Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: The product works great. If you have a small clean up (less than 12-15 minutes with max suction power) I highly recommend this product. If you have 15 min+ clean up, this product will not work that well. The weaker strength mode will provide a little longer battery life, but it doesn't have the suction power that you would expect. The battery pack also gets considerably warm. This product could definitely be better if it had a detachable battery that you could buy multiple of, for bigger jobs. I am satisfied with this product as it works great in the kitchen after cooking or guests.
customer_reviews.author: Waheed

customer_reviews.title: Bad product.
customer_reviews.text: My Girlfriend tried to convince me for months this was a quality brand/product. Looks like she was wrong. Battery failed after just a few uses. Amazon will not process a return as it is now 5 days past the 30 day return window. Dyson customer service response has been less that impressive if that. I'd recommend you stay clear of this brand/product based on our experience thus far. I will post an update if/when they decide to replace this paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: A. Colletti

customer_reviews.title: doesnt come with a docking station which is a big ...
customer_reviews.text: doesnt come with a docking station which is a big problem storing it/ also dyson doesnt show the proper docking station to match very unfriendly! mazon also recommand a docking station that does not match...
customer_reviews.author: Bosmat eliahu

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Absolute worst purchase ever from Amazon. A friend recommended it so I tried it. Right away it did not have a lot of suction so I put it in a closet and used it a few times. Decided I would try to give it another go, so I tried to use it a couple of times in the same problem. Now, when I pull the trigger it will run for about 20 seconds and then run out of juice even though it has been on the charger. I just threw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: A Love

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.text: We have many dyson products. The lastest is the hair dryer, which I would give 10 stars if I could. This vacuum was a gift to my husband from me. He told me today it quit. He checked to make sure it was plugged in, clean, charging correctly, etc. It doesn't work and the return window is now closed. That is very disappointing! I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Like All Dysons, Nothing Compares
customer_reviews.text: Never go wrong with a Dyson. Sure the battery on max suction is about 6-10mins. Seems short but the suction is so strong that you can clean your whole car in that time. You can change the setting to normal and you get about 20mins. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Superior product.
customer_reviews.text: Just a few ideas as feedback. The battery can only last half an hour, and takes 3.5 hours to fully recharge. Why can't Dyson manufacture a battery pack that can be worn like a backpack and connected to the vacuum by a short cord? Second, the ergonomics can be better. When I vacuum my carpet I try to firmly press the vacuum downwards onto the carpet, but due to the shape of the handle, my hand hurts by doing so and I have to resort to using my other hand to apply downward force.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Dyson Product
customer_reviews.text: Form and function are well matched and suit me very well. Serious suction, adequate battery life for me, and quite easy to clean. I love it - especially after using an inexpensive Chinese hand-held for the past year which employed a mysterious, novel, and hard-to-comprehend battery-management and recharging protocol! It also had pretty weak suction and made my Dustbuster from 40 years ago seem like it had the power of a rocket ship. The Dyson is a major improvement on both and I am very happy. Even accounting for the price of the Dyson, it is a good value to me!
customer_reviews.author: C. P. Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: has no suction
customer_reviews.text: This is from a great company and I expected it to be as good as there other products it is a good idea but the suction power is very poor and it dose not pick anything up unless you use the motorized cleaning head. I was greatly disappointed and sent the product back
customer_reviews.author: Janice Merry

customer_reviews.title: ignore the bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: i alomst didnt buy this based on the number of reviews complaining about how to empty the canister. IGNORE THEM. could not be easier to empty. the rest of the vacuum is top-notch. attachments plus suction make it perfect for pet hair and dusting getting to all the spots youve missed for years. my nit would be that the battery is not a swappable standard so it has to be recharged on the wall when it runs out of juice. worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Dyson Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: In a good way! This is my first Dyson vacuum and I'm impressed. I love the included attachments and suction power. The versatility of the cordless design is amazing. Vacuuming the couch, vacuuming the car, everything is so simple and quick! My ONLY concern is how closely the inner filter is to the side of the capture chamber. I sucked up a piece of popcorn and it got lodged in between. Not a huge deal and definitely not a deal breaker. Great battery life, good design, plentiful peripherals.
customer_reviews.author: Carbon Neutral

customer_reviews.title: Suction sucks! I do not recommend. You failed on this one Tyson.
customer_reviews.text: This model of the handheld Dyson vacuum is not nearly as powerful as the original we bought seven or eight years ago. Very disappointing. We have owned two upright vacuums as well. Not at all pleased with this device. Waited to return it because we just got busy. Wish I would have. Almost useless.
customer_reviews.author: dennis m pendergist

customer_reviews.title: That truly sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised, but battery life on high speed suction doesn’t last more than 10 minutes. That truly sucks!
customer_reviews.author: David Tipps

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Dyson's handheld vacuum, although fairly expensive, works very well in all of it's modes. I've tried other hand held vacs but, unlike the others, Dyson's actually generates a forceful vacuum. Hope the battery lasts a while but would be worth replacing if it does eventually fail. The only thing I sort of don't like is the outer machine is so completely plastic although it is light weight and seems to be pretty durable. Kudos to Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Holden

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is so so
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this hand vacuum for over a year now. Its lightweight and easy to use. Dumping the debris is easy but needs to be done often. My biggest complaint is the battery life. I can only vacuum my steps and a small area under a table before the battery needs to be recharged. This is not because the battery is a year old its been that way since day one. I like my Dyson products but this one has been a slight disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma's thoughts

customer_reviews.title: Fairly good but...
customer_reviews.text: Fairly good vacuuming. It’s kind of weird to figure out, and it fell part the first time I tried to use the clean-out feature. Removing the air filter requires a pair of pliers to remove it. Why they didn’t test that feature before selling it, I don’t know. The vacuum cleaner is way quieter than the BD unit I had. Pretty expensive.
customer_reviews.author: automan

customer_reviews.title: great suction and attachments
customer_reviews.text: Wow! this has powerful suction and cleans well along edges and in corners. I especially enjoy the attachments. the long one helps me get under and behind the radiators in our home. the small brush helped me to clean up the cushions on our black sofa. sucks up dirt and cat hair very easily. It's easy to empty too. The one drawback is that the charge lasts for about 15-20 minutes. i find i need to keep it plugged in to be able to use this on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I needed something for the stairs since I had had it with lugging a full size Dyson up and down. This is easy to use and has great suction power. The trigger doesn't lock so that is one downside but on high power the battery only lasts about 30 min so your finger doesn't get overly tired or cramped. Seems to recharge fairly quickly. I've had great experiences with Dyson when calling their help line (not about this product) so that's another plus.
customer_reviews.author: Comparison shopper extreme

customer_reviews.title: AVOID AT ALL COST
customer_reviews.text: This product is a massive RIP off. Sure it has great suction power but like the reviews all stated for its price and battery life u are burning money. It took me 3hrs to fully charge for literally 10 FREAKING MINTUES before dying out. It's a joke and not worth it. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: It certainly does suck.
customer_reviews.text: This is fine for general vacuuming, but where it really excels is in sucking up bugs, flies, beetles, and other creepy crawlers. I don’t know how wasps get in the house, but they do, and this handheld is just the thing to move them outside again. No mess. No squished insects. Just the satisfying rattle of pests spinning around at 800 rpms. Once caught, take the unit outside, give it one last surge to disorient title buggers, and free them on the lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Feldspar

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated buying this, it is expensive compared to others. But I'm so glad I did. I keep it in the garage and in 5-10 minutes I can vacuum out my cars. What special about this is (1) the power and (2) the 3 cleaning heads are ideal ... I use all three and the change is snap in; takes 1 second. It's simple to dump the debris, no filters.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Pez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this vacuum because it’s a Dyson and figured it was probably worth the extra money. That said, we couldn’t have been more disappointed with it. First of all, the battery life is horrible. We were only able to vacuum an eight foot couch before having to recharge it. Then after only three months the brush attachment stopped working. At that point it was nothing more than an expensive paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Nick & Cheri Moretta

customer_reviews.title: STOP INVESTING MONEY IN CHEAP HANDHELDS AND MAKE THIS YOUR LAST HANDHELD VACUUM PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: Having a handheld vacuum handy when you don't want to bring out the "big guns" is great. After owning several small, inexpensive handhelds with little suction and failing batteries, I decided to invest in a quality Dyson vacuum. I already own a Dyson upright and a canister. This handheld has a power brush ideal for dog hair on the sofa and a brush to clean the dust off the cover of my seldom used pool table. Also great for small cleanups around the house. The power is exceptional and has exceeded my expectations. Amazon had a sale on this one and that only "sweetened" the deal. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cory David

customer_reviews.title: The best hand-held vac out there.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent hand-held vac. Better than all the other brands. Quieter than the rest. Holds a charge a long time. Easy to clean. But, it is spendy. You get what you pay for. Our last one lasted for many years. I bought the Black and Decker for my mom and she really liked it, but this one is better by far.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the apartment
customer_reviews.text: I like this vacuum because of the variety of attachments, its size, and convenience. Overall it was worth the purchase. The battery life lasts about 20 minutes, which for an obsessive cleaner like me can be not long enough. Also, like most vacuums, hair gets caught around the bristles and needs to be cut out which can be an annoying process (I have long hair so I have to do this once a month). Emptying this is a breeze and it holds a good amount of dirt for a handheld. Overall it's definitely a pricy investment... but I think it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara S

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Investment
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what to say other than ghis vacuum sucks, big time, in the best way. There are two levels of suction, regular and max. Both work great on stairs and furniture. The only thing to watch out for is the max suction wears the battery down in less than 10minutes, but I find I don’t need it much longer than that because of how well it works. It was more than I wanted to spend on a handheld vacuum, but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ScottG124

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of those pesky bugs and persistent pet hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It sucks up just about everything. The long nose attachment is perfect for catching spiders, crickets, centipedes and stink bugs. The motor attachment is great for cleaning cat hair off furniture and even if I go over dusty areas with this vacuum, the dust doesn't blow out of the fan. Its light and easy to maneuver though some angles cause dirt to fall out of the chamber but thats only if its upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Mica Matlack

customer_reviews.title: Quick Cleanup on Aisle 2
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and replacing my last handheld Dyson that was at least 7-8 years old. The difference was you don't get many tools with the original purchase. So, I spent another $45 on tools needed to get attachments for blinds, extensions for length, etc. But it's great quality and does a nice job with much longer battery life.
customer_reviews.author: KimBo

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied and impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the very best of the best in handheld vacuums. I've tried several others from Shark, Bissel, Black & Decker, and Hoover and they all pale in comparison to this vacuum. I eventually switched to using a small shop vac instead of hand vacs for a while after being frustrated with poor performance of other hand vacs. This one has an impressive battery life, it's got powerful suction (enough to handle any job I used to have to use my shop vac for), and it's super light and is perfect for touchup cleanings and regular house cleanings alike.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great Suction and Power/Life
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by all the reviews with concerns about the power/suction. I hardly ever use the Max speed for it as the normal suction is plenty sufficient for most tasks. I use it mostly for cat hair/litter box area and random cleanup around the place. Really glad I wasn’t deterred by the negative reviews here. I’ve had it for 6 months or so. Buy some extra filters if you’re concerned about losing suction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We designed
customer_reviews.text: Well designed powerful hand held vacuum. Easy to empty, no bags, good suction in maximum power mode. I understand complaints of short battery life, but it not for vacuuming entire house or even a room. It is for odd jobs like the stairs, car, corners of walls near the ceiling, railing of the slider doors etc. There it shines and should be praised.
customer_reviews.author: RKDR

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a boss
customer_reviews.text: After buying a few mediocre handheld vacuums over the years, i decided to just spend the money and get a dyson. I am not disappointed at all! it works amazingly in every way! Really good on animal hair and cleaning out the car
customer_reviews.author: Austin P.Top Contributor: Drums

customer_reviews.title: Good for 4 months and then died
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the vacuum in July and really liked it when it was working. All of sudden, it won't take a charge and appears dead. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: HoosierDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: The main issue with this Dyson is that its overpriced. The "high" suction setting is pretty weak and the "max" setting while strong is only gonna last you 6-8 minutes max. Then its off to the charger for another 3.5 hrs. I mean I guess you could use the "high" setting on hard floors but then again if your gonna do that just use a broom. The "high" setting on any surface like a rug/carpet of any kind is pretty pointless as the suction just doesn't cut it. Mind you this device is $199.99.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Get's it done.
customer_reviews.text: Although pricey it performs well. I bought mainly for the powered beater head and that is really nice. Appreciate the dual power setting. That is really needed as on high the battery does not last long. The good news is the low setting extends battery life so that most jobs can be completed without recharge. Does have a tendency to overheat and shut off if run on HIGH for long time. But over all it does the jobs I need it for very well.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum, but still disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum itself is very nice and can be used in a number of different situations, but the battery life is the disappointing part. If you use it on high power, you only get approximately 15 minutes of use before having to charge it for a few hours again. Had I known that real world use wood result in low operation time I would have probably save some money and gone with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Larson

customer_reviews.title: Should have been better for such a high price
customer_reviews.text: Docked one star for price. Docked another for not coming with a charging base. Docked another because instead you have to plug in a little adapter.. in my experience those ports aren't designed for constant plugging and replugging and will wear out. What stupid and ridiculous oversight from a company that touts its engineering.
customer_reviews.author: Great Dictator

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Wowwww. We love this guy! We registered for this hand held vacuum for our wedding and now we are definitely saving up for the bigger version. Definitely worth the buy. It gets everything. From our couch to our rugs, there’s zero dirt or hair left behind. Which is saying a lot for a home with two furry dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn H

customer_reviews.title: Poor Battery life, do not buy it, Bad, Bad, Bad
customer_reviews.text: This unit works rather well when the battery is charged. In a matter of minutes, the battery gets discharged and you have to wait for couple of hours before you can use it. When directly attached to the wall-AC, the unit is inoperable. Considering the unit quality and a $200 price tag, in my opinion, this unit is a RIPOFF! Do not buy it. I am planning to return it back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: FM Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: It sucks, in a good way
customer_reviews.text: It's s nice vacuum just not easy to get accessories for it. Dyson refuses to tell you what it compatible... I was able to order a vacuum wand and charging base (same as all 7/8s) Nice vacuum works well and empties a lot easier than my older dc44. Beater bar head works great for furniture, great when you have pets.
customer_reviews.author: Duane P

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The red tab at the top that opens the canister will not open now after only two uses. Poor construction and concept. I am upset because It is expensive. I want to return it and get credit. Please respond. Sandy Smith
customer_reviews.author: sandy smith

customer_reviews.title: but I am glad I went with it
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I was very hesitant to get this vacuum, because it is not cheap, but I am glad I went with it! Perfect for what I need it for (mainly car cleaning and small areas in the kitchen after kids make a mess). It holds battery just fine and different attachments that it comes with are awesome. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasiya

customer_reviews.title: Good for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: Great for picking up my Golden'Retriever's hair left everywhere. The bad news - for this much money a 15 minutes use time and then 13 hours to recharge is not so great.
customer_reviews.author: Kenman

customer_reviews.title: Top notch quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one because I just love this product. I think it is amazing with lots of power. The battery lives a long time then it can be used anywhere. I highly recommend this product for anyone. Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Book Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery
customer_reviews.text: Suction works best when on full speed but that kills the battery quickly. I didn't have it very long before my wall charger stoped charging my vacuum completely. Its very expensive to replace the charger and a knock off one I thought would work because of its online reviews actually didn't work. I love dyson vacuums but I don't think Id recommend this handheld.
customer_reviews.author: Monica E

customer_reviews.title: Good (for sale price) not great
customer_reviews.text: This is OK. Suction is great on MAX setting but that shortens battery life to about 20 minutes. I find myself reaching for my $20 Welikara hand held because it has a light to illuminate darker spaces although it is not as powerful as this Dyson. Almost returned but kept because of sale price. I wouldn't recommend paying full price for this.
customer_reviews.author: Shazamtc

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily for some up keep around the house and also from time to time to quick vacuum my vehicle. Overall suction is amazing, attachments are a breeze to use, but the battery life is why I can not give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: DAR

customer_reviews.title: Dyson V7
customer_reviews.text: Primarily using it to clean the mattress and seems to work fine. Occasionally use it to pick things off the floor. People say the battery seems to go down around the two year mark, so it's a wait and watch till then. For now, on max - it seems to vacuum say two queen sized mattresses easily.
customer_reviews.author: Deepika

customer_reviews.title: DYSON IS THE ABSOLUTE BEST OF THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: My old Dyson finally bit the dust after some twenty years and I was lost without it. This model is better, more powerful and I'm so happy to have Dyson in my life again. Sounds weird huh? This unit I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carnagie Thornhill

customer_reviews.title: dammit TWO models
customer_reviews.text: I did NOT see that the car/boat & trigger version were 2 separate...read the answered ? and it said with no differentiation as far as models go...."it includes car charger"....I could be missing it...BUT dammit....you need it lasted 15 min on Dog hair in car which is the reason I ordered it. ...Live in a loft...so don't have plug in available for shop vac..like I used to. I guess I expected to much.....I would not spend the $$ if you REALLY want to clean your car. Dyson...you let me down.
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several handheld vacuums and this is the best I have had. I love it and haven’t had any problems noted by other customers. I have three cats and a dog and it’s been great for sucking up hair in the house and in the vehicles. Very happy customer so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Wish the battery would last a bit longer. I have 4 levels of stairs all carpeted. But it works great on blinds.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Small Vacume
customer_reviews.text: I got the item as described with great shipping! The Dyson V7 is a great machine. Its small but powerful to suck and clean up messes. I used this on carpet and hard wood floors and it works as design!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: No suction!! Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, lightweight and good battery life, however, I’m not that impressed with the suction. Dyson always talks about the fabulous suction they developed, but not on this one, equivalent to any other standard dust buster.
customer_reviews.author: Ccknight

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This product certainly wasn’t life-changing for cleaning my home. And I’m disgusted and disappointed, considering the price, that the battery stopped holding a charge after less than two years.
customer_reviews.author: HaleyPM

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter has vacuum and I loves using it at her house so much I had to get hair. This thing is AMAZING on pet hair. So glad we got it. Might be more expensive than others but so worth it
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: I have an older model of this vacuum and the batter died and has to be replaced...the battery is 130.00 from Dyson, so I just bought another better/newer model for 164.00 here.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reaux

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy
customer_reviews.text: I am only able able to clean half my car before the battery dies. This product performs just as well as other Dyson products I own. Just wish the battery was larger...
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Charging until stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum worked great until it wouldn’t charge anymore. The charging cord wouldn’t stay in place and seemed loose. Dyson sent replacement products buy it didn’t fix the issue. Ultimately we received brand new vacuum. Dyson is great with its customers.
customer_reviews.author: Laura & Nick Crawley

customer_reviews.title: I love this handheld vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this handheld vacuum. The attachments it comes with are great and it's so nice to be able to do quick clean ups without having to pull out my full-size, corded Dyson vacuum. This handheld is powerful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanye S. Fojt

customer_reviews.title: A very temperamental tool
customer_reviews.text: This product was very delicate. The filter clogs almost immediately. A slightly wet fliter will lead to the waste container not being able to be emptied.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Kradel

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. The vacuum cleaned my car well. Had lots of dog hair, too. Luckily I got most of the dirt out before it died. Lasted 15 minutes. I wanted to send it back, but I decided to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gray

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS VACUUM
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS VACUUM! Easy to use and powerful enough to pick up the shedding hair on the stairs from my Golden Retriever. I have a Dyson Animal that I have had for 10years that is still going strong no problems whatsoever. I know that all Dyson products are expensive but they are well made and last a long time. Just bought our daughter a new Dyson for Christmas last year which she loves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It “sucks”
customer_reviews.text: Love theses little vacuums a bit pricey, yes but wow do they “suck”! Have one that I use around the house and to vacuum off the dog when he rolls in the mud. Bought one for each of our kids for Chtistmas, they love em for house and cars and vacuuming up cat and dog fur that has been shed
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Really great and light weight perfect to remove bits and pieces at hard to reach places. But remember battery on remains about 5mins after full charging . But understandably is what makes the device so light
customer_reviews.author: Shshshsh

customer_reviews.title: Great little product
customer_reviews.text: Great little product one fully charged it works really well keep in mind when using it for suction mode the battery goes really fast I'd say like in 10 minutes which is great for doing your car cleaning a few things around the house but don't expect to have it sitting on the charger regularly.
customer_reviews.author: StephanieL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This little sucker is completely awesome. It packs a major punch. Best little dust buster type mini-vacuum ever! This product ROCKs. It’s almost fun to vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great machine but battery life is shorter then desired...
customer_reviews.text: Great machine but has shorter battery life then stated, I only get about 15 min at full power. We also have the Ball machine and it also works great overall but not so great in narrow and hard to reach area, this u it come in handy. I just wish the battery was more powerful...
customer_reviews.author: Deco Diver

customer_reviews.title: No Wall Mounting Bracket exists
customer_reviews.text: Product itself seemed fine. The mounting bracket that I bought with it would not fit. When I called Dyson and asked for the part number for the correct wall mount, Dyson said that they did not make one because the V7 was intended to be portable. Well, even if you are going to use it for a car, boat, etc., you still have to put it someplace when not in use. I didn't send it back because I didn't see a good alternative. I hung it awkwardly on a hook. Just plain bad design that they did not make it to fit existing brackets.
customer_reviews.author: JFG

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Two settings for more or less power allows for longer time between charges. Lower power for light jobs. Really easy to clean out canister; just hit a button, bottom opens and empties. Wish it had an attachment that extended the wand. Otherwise it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Katlvr

customer_reviews.title: Power
customer_reviews.text: Tired of wasting money on black and decker and others poney up the money this thing is worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Top Gun

customer_reviews.title: Dyson v7.
customer_reviews.text: I own the same Dyson v7 in Japan...for cleaning the mattress. And I must say, the pricewise as well, buying this in US is so much better. Also the Amazon service is lot better in this case. In Japan, for some reason there was no instruction booklet! Here in US. it was derlivered as the on line info tells you on the next day! I used the machine when I got it and it works very well. I will recomend this to all my friend.
customer_reviews.author: yasuko austin

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Big dyson fan. I have had two vacuums and they let 7 years. Got this for the vehicle’s and small messes. Easy enough my child can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Megheartsamazon

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed that it didn't come with a charging cradle
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful motor. As all of Dyson's products the quality is top notch. This was a replacement that I'd had for a long time. I was a little disappointed that it didn't come with a charging cradle. I bought one from Dyson for $22. I'm not sure if the battery pack is replaceable. The old one did and I replace them twice.
customer_reviews.author: Siron

customer_reviews.title: Am not disappointed. Works great
customer_reviews.text: Have been wanting to get one of these and decided to spend a little extra. Am not disappointed. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Vadrozsa

customer_reviews.title: Easy vacuuming
customer_reviews.text: I love my vacuum. I use it for the auto and vacuuming my vents. It had great pressure, charges easily, and the tools are easy to add and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J. McKenny

customer_reviews.title: Tall on suction. Short on battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for professional window cleaning crews to suction out window sills. Great power but only get 20-30 minute battery life. Probably fine for typical household use. We need longer life to be practical for professional use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasts too short
customer_reviews.text: I love this Vacuum Cleaner but the battery last only about 5 minutes on high power which is terrible for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: skimcpa

customer_reviews.title: Charger Needed
customer_reviews.text: We had hoped that our upright Dyson charger would charge both of our Dyson vacuums but it doesn't. Make sure you order the charger or you can also just plug it in to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Got to have this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the hand held vacuum I have dreamed of. I had bought one for my son and after using his had to get one of my own. Thank you Dyson for living up to your reputation!
customer_reviews.author: Lane S.

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Used a couple times. The power suction is the best, the noise is not loud, but the battery sucks, 10mins of use and done, 0% left.
customer_reviews.author: Comprando em Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Gave early Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Battery life questionable. Battery temperature while charging hot. Will provide follow up review. Update: wife likes it and satisfied with battery life vacuuming stairs. I up a star . (well made)
customer_reviews.author: T. Farrow

customer_reviews.title: the best yet
customer_reviews.text: This Dyson vacuum is the best one I've had yet. Lots of power, last's longer then my last one, very easy too clean. I highly recommend the Dyson V7.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Voges

product_meta.title: Dyson V7 Trigger Cord-Free Handheld Vacuum Cleaner
product_meta.description: The strongest suction of any other cordless handheld vacuum. Extra tools for tough tasks. Longer run time than the Dyson V6 handheld vacuum. Dyson free 2 year warranty covers parts and labor, plus free shipping there and back.
feature_bullets: Capacity (volume) - .15 gallon; Cord free; Hassle free; No cord to unravel, plug in, drag around and restrict your reach; You can quickly and easily clean when you need to
Tools included: Mini motorized tool, combination tool, crevice tool
Powered by Dyson digital motor V7; The most powerful handheld vacuum; Up to 30 minutes of fade free suction; With fade free lithium ion batteries, suction starts strong and stays strong
Hygienic dirt ejector; Hygienically drive out trapped dust and debris in single action; There's no need to touch the dirt
2 year warranty. Dyson free 2 year warranty covers parts and labor

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,311 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Vacuum^Mini Motorized Tool^Combination Tool^Crevice Tool^Wall Charger
